cluster_relations.rel_desc: The existence of mysteries to be solved is presented as a condition that allows urban legends to continue thriving.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject functions as an enabling condition that allows or sustains the existence, continuation, or thriving of the object.

qualifiers.TemporalQualifier: As long as there are mysteries to be solved
qualifiers.OperationalConstraint: presence of unresolved questions and enigmas
qualifiers.ConditionExpression: if mysteries to be solved exist, urban legends will continue to thrive
qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Effect: supports continuation and thriving of legends

remarks: Relation created mainly to capture the conditional nature of mysteries sustaining legends.
Relation created mainly to capture the conditional nature of mysteries sustaining legends.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The existence of fears to be faced is another condition that supports the continued thriving of urban legends.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject functions as an enabling condition that allows or sustains the existence, continuation, or thriving of the object.
cluster_relations.subject_class_group: Urban Legend Fear and Risk Themes

qualifiers.TemporalQualifier: As long as there are fears to be faced
qualifiers.OperationalConstraint: presence of confronting fears or challenges
qualifiers.ConditionExpression: if fears to be faced exist, urban legends will continue to thrive
qualifiers.OtherQualifier: PsychologicalBasis: fears as motivational substrate for legends

remarks: Relation emphasizes the dependence of legends' vitality on human fears.
